description.value: Either through study, exposure, or familial devotion, you have the magic of nagas bubbling in your blood. During your daily preparations, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Daze]{Daze}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Detect Magic]{Detect Magic}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Mage Hand]{Mage Hand}. Until your next daily preparations, you can cast the chosen spell as an occult innate cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
